author: patrickl
msg: Change "%PATH%";. to "%PATH%;." in the classpath argument as the JVM will still crap out if %PATH% ends in a "\" character. By moving the quote after the ":." characters, the JVM is able to parse the classpath argument properly.

author: patrickl
msg: Append %PATH% for all Windows platforms since the %0 DOS bug is not limited to Windows 9x platforms
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'J2EE_14_12'.

author: patrickl
msg: Correct typos in code that were causing the "disposeminimizedwindow" and "minimizedwindowicon" attributes to be incorrectly set

author: patrickl
msg: Append %PATH% only for Windows 9x platforms since it is unnecessary for later Windows platforms. Also, add ";." onto %PATH% since a "\" character at the end of the classpath argument will confuse the JVM.
